===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A cream-coloured pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to nourish [[yin]], reduce ''heat'', arrest excessive menstrual discharge and leukorrhea, in the treatment of excessive menstrual discharge of dark violet blood or morbid leukorrhea".

Gujing pills have the following herbal ingredients:
